#include <iostream>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t)
    {
        int n,i;
        unsigned long long int a[101],mul=1;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            a[i]=a[i];
            mul=(mul*a[i])%MOD;
        }
        cout<<mul<<endl;
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
